Ramulus looked at the Stegosaurus w=
ith a strange look, =93You mean these

ed over at the Stegosaurus that had

ng this smart.=94

 Night Shift.=94 Ramulus said. =93I got some medical supplies

ight be able to patch you up, if not we=92ll get you back

r we have to.=94
